item.title: I-84 West - Exit 208
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 208 - BL-84/ID-27/Burley/Paul.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 West Onramp
item.description: ID-27 north to Paul at I-84 west to Twin Falls and Boise (Exit 208).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 208
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 208 - BL-84/ID-27/Burley/Paul.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West at ID-81
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West at ID-81 south to Declo. Continue on US-30/BL-84 for Burley.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West Approaching ID-81
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West approaching ID-81 south in Burley.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; left for US-30/BL-84 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 West; left for US-30/BL-84 West.

item.title: US-30 West/BL-84 West at BL-84/ID-27
item.description: US-30 West/BL-84 West (Main St.) at BL-84/ID-27 (Overland Ave.). Turn right for ID-27 North/BL-84 West to Paul; left for ID-27 south to Oakley. Continue straight on US-30 west for Hansen.

item.title: End ID-81 North at US-30/BL-84
item.description: End ID-81 North at US-30/BL-84 in Burley. Use US-30 East/BL-84 East for Heyburn; US-30 West/BL-84 West for Burley.

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 211). Use US-30 west for Heyburn and Burley; I-84/US-30 East for Pocatello and Ogden (Utah); I-84 West for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30 in Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: I-84 west on Exit 211 offramp. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; turn left for BL-84 West/US-30 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: End BL-84 East at ID-24/I-84
item.description: End BL-84 (Burley and Heyburn) at I-84 west and ID-24. Use I-84 west for Twin Falls and Boise. Use ID-24 for Rupert and Minidoka.

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East Approaching I-84/ID-24
item.description: BL-84/US-30 east approaching I-84 and ID-24. US-30 turns east onto I-84 and the road continues as ID-24 towards Rupert.

item.title: ID-81 North Approaching BL-84/US-30
item.description: Approaching BL-84/US-30 on ID-81 north in Burley.

item.title: ID-27 North at I-84 Onramp
item.description: BL-84 West/ID-27 North at I-84 (Exit 208). Merge right for I-84 East/Ogden (Utah)/Pocatello. Continue over bridge for I-84 West/Twin Falls and ID-27 North to Paul.

item.title: I-84 West Offramp at ID-27
item.description: I-84 west Exit 208 offramp at ID-27. Turn right for ID-27 north to Paul; left for BL-84 East/ID-27 south to Burley and Oakley.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 211, US-30/ID-24 to Heyburn and Burley

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: US-30/ID-24/BL-84 at I-84 interchange

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84 and US-30
item.description: I-84 west onramp at the eastern terminus of ID-24

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30 Jct.
item.description: End of ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 208
item.description: I-84 at Exit 208, BL-84/ID-27

item.title: ID-27 North at US-30
item.description: ID-27 north at US-30/BL-84 junction to Hansen,Paul, and Heyburn

item.title: ID-27 North at US-30
item.description: US-30 junction on ID-27 north
